io.oasp.module.rest.service.impl.json

Class AbstractJsonDeserializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T>
      • io.oasp.module.rest.service.impl.json.AbstractJsonDeserializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the class to be deserialized

    public abstract class AbstractJsonDeserializer<T>
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T>
    Helper class to simplify implementation of JsonDeserializer.
    Author:
    agreul, hohwiller
